column6: Wolverine's claws and healing factor have helped him survive some of the most dangerous situations and locales. But what happens when dark magic transforms him into a werewolf? Guest starring Jack Russell, the Werewolf-by-Night!
column8: | colorist:Ulises Arreola | letterer:Joe Caramagna | other:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Francis Portela | inker:David Williams | writer:Fred Van Lente
